_header: All desolate from joy or hearts heal
_description: A roundel (associated with Charles d’Orléans) — 14 lines

BLHar682.First Lines:
All desolat from ioy or hertis heleI yow biseche or þat y to yow
                    write…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…That what y say ye take in no dispiteSyn nede me nedith euery
                    dele
BLHar682.Note: As written, repeats first words of lines 1-2 at end to indicate going back to first four lines of the roundel.
